scripts.gh-pages: npm run build; npm run export; rm -rf ../hasura-gh-pages/*; mv ./out/* ../hasura-gh-pages/; rm -rf out
scripts.migrate: export $(grep -v '^#' .env | xargs); yes | DEBUG='*' npx migrate up --compiler='ts:@deepcase/hasura/compiler/index.js'
scripts.unmigrate: export $(grep -v '^#' .env | xargs); yes | DEBUG='*' npx migrate down --compiler='ts:@deepcase/hasura/compiler/index.js'
scripts.gitpod: export $(grep -v '^#' .env | xargs); export HASURA_URL=$(gp url 8080); export PORT=3001; npx next dev -p $PORT
